description: This simple rice salad is full of the flavours of spring with sweet peas and broadbeans.
keywords: Rice salad,Pescatarian,Seafood free,Gluten free,Egg free,Low sugar,Sesame free,High protein,High fibre,Soy free,Wheat free,Vegetarian,Rice
name: Pea, Broad Bean & Mint Rice Salad with Halloumi Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Cook the rice according to pack instructions and pour into a large bowl. Cook the broad beans and peas in a pan of boiling water for 3 minutes and drain well. Tip into the bowl with the rice.
Pour over the olive oil and red wine vinegar and stir in the spring onions, mint and parsley and mix well.
Heat a drizzle of oil in a non-stick pan on medium high heat and sear the halloumi for 2 minutes on each side. Add to the salad and serve.
